column4: hello I have the package called "inkscape" installed from the official repositories; I found the nightly builds of this package, but I dont want to get rid of the repository version; anyway to install the deb and not have it replace the current version? install it somewhere else maybe?
well you can drop it in your home and call it with full paths, but it requires some effort to prevent conflicts and library mixups
anyway to rename the package so that naming is not the same: something like inkscape-nightly?
the problem is not just the package name but they probably also try to change the same files
